argumentText:
ARGUMENT
z

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | wfr1.1 | |- R We A |
| 2 |  | wfr1.2 | |- R Se A |
| 3 |  | wfr1.3 | |- F = wrecs ( R , A , G ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_wfrlem11 | |- Fun F |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( F u. { <. z , ( G ` ( F |` Pred ( R , A , z ) ) ) >. } ) = ( F u. { <. z , ( G ` ( F |` Pred ( R , A , z ) ) ) >. } ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 3, 5 | #P_wfrlem16 | |- dom F = A |
| 7 |  | #P_df-fn | |- ( F Fn A <-> ( Fun F /\ dom F = A ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 6, 7 | #P_mpbir2an | |- F Fn A |
